(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

41.brief: a particle asking a question, expecting a negative response
41.long: a particle asking a question, to which a negative answer is expected.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
the wind; fig: applied to empty doctrines.
(a) the sea, in contrast to the land, (b) a particular sea or lake, e.g. the sea of Galilee (Tiberias), the Red Sea.
I listen, hearken to, obey, answer.

41.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
41.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
